channel.title: Concepts on Provision cloud resources using Kubernetes CRDs & Terraform
channel.description: Recent content in Concepts on Provision cloud resources using Kubernetes CRDs & Terraform

item.title: Concepts | Kubeform
item.description: Concepts Concepts help you to learn about the different parts of the Kubeform and the abstractions it uses. This concept section is divided into the following modules: What is Kubeform? Overview provides an introduction to Kubeform. Architecture provides a visual representation of Kubeform architecture. It also provides a brief overview of the components it uses. TFState provides an description of how kubeform handles the tfstate.
